text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff... Fini—hm? M-myfeet! Oh no, did a shark bite me?!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ah, ah... Aaaahhh! T-Trainer, tell me,<n>do I still have legs?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Th-they feel weird, but I'm too scared<n>to look! They feel all
slimey... Are my<n>feet inside the shark's mouth?!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Seaweed?! Ah, you're right, it's all<n>over me... Uurgh... I just
jumped to<n>conclusions again...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Sorry... I caused a real scene, didn't<n>I? Ah, b-but I think I
cleared the time<n>you wanted me to reach... right?

We're about halfway through the<n>academy's summer
camp. Doto might<n>not have changed much in terms of<n>
demeanor, but her racing skills are<n>steadily improving.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
No, I still have a long ways to go!<n>B-but if by some
chance—some<n>miracle—I did improve...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Then it would definitely be thanks to<n>your guidance!
Th-thank you so much!
choice_data_list: Nah, your perseverance is what got you results.
Nah, your perseverance is what got you results.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
What?! N-no, I-I'm telling you, I'm<n>just stubborn... It's all
thanks to your<n>clear instructions.
choice_data_list:
Well, you've got the skills to carry out those
instructions.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! Th-that's not—I-I only do well<n>because you're so
serious about<n>training me!

Somehow, we've started a<n>never-ending compliment cycle.
Still,<n>this is a good chance for me to boost<n>Doto's
confidence, so I continue...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Aaauuugh! P-p-p-please... stop! I'm<n>sorry!
choice_data_list: Um, there's no need to apologize.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
R-regardless, I can't take it anymore...<n>Please... I've never
been<n>complimented this much before...<n>Urgh...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: But... it's nice to know you believe in<n>me so much...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I wish I could... thank you somehow...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ah... I-I'll get back to running!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: M-more seaweed?! I-I'm going to<n>slip and faaaall!

Once our training for the day is<n>finished, Meisho Doto and I
part<n>ways, and I make my way back to<n>the dorms alone...
Or so I think.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: OW! Urgh... Where did that... pillar<n>come from...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Eyah! Ah, y-yes! Sorry...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Um... N-not really, but... maybe? I don'tneed anything, but... um...

Doto struggles to find the words she<n>needs, but I know
she'll get there. I<n>wait patiently as she gathers the<n>
courage needed to make her request.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: U-UM!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I-I know this might be just a bother<n>for you... a-and we
might end up in a<n>huge mess because of me...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I-In fact, worst-case scenario, we<n>could get caught up in an
explosion,<n>and the resulting shockwave would—

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Um... I-I want to see the fireworks!<n>S-so...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: C-come with me... p-pleashe...

It's been several hours since I<n>accepted Meisho Doto's
unexpected<n>invite. We left for the fireworks<n>shortly after,
with Doto leading the<n>way, but...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: AAAAHHHHH! The fireworks are<n>probably o-over by now...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry, this is all because I got<n>lost... And then I was
almost<n>kidnapped by that owl…
choice_data_list: Who knew owls were so vicious?
Who knew owls were so vicious?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Urgh... But no matter what happened,<n>you never turned
back... We just kept<n>going, but now that we're finally<n>
here... Nothing.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I-I saw online that this place is perfect<n>for viewing the
fireworks... Not a lot of<n>people know about it, so you're<n>
guaranteed to get a good view...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I don't know why I even try. I'm a<n>walking disaster... No
matter how hard<n>I try, things never work out right...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I really, really wanted to make you<n>happy too...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
B-but there's no fireworks. You did<n>all that walking just to
stare at an<n>empty sky...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I just ended up wasting your time<n>again. I-I'm so—

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Y-yes?!
choice_data_list: Thanks for doing so much for me.
Thanks for doing so much for me.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I-I... Urgh... Trainer!

Sure, we missed the fireworks, but<n>Doto showed me how
much she<n>cares. Just as I'm about to suggest<n>we see the
fireworks some other<n>time...
Boom...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Hiyaaah! Ah...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: H-huh? Fireworks? I-I thought they<n>would be over by now...

A quick search on my smartphone<n>reveals that they were
delayed due to<n>an unspecified setback.
choice_data_list:
Good thing we got lost. We would've missed it
otherwise.

Good thing we got lost. We would've missed it
otherwise.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Y-you think so? Does that mean... my<n>clumsiness was
useful?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Ah, wh-what am I saying?! Of course<n>not! I-I promise I'll be
more careful<n>going forward! But...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ehehe... I'm glad I did all that<n>research. ♪

As Meisho Doto looks up to the sky,<n>the light from the
fireworks reflects in<n>her tears, making her sparkle in turn.

Maybe... just maybe, she's gained a<n>little confidence after
today.
